long_description: Put this National Geographic Wild Hatchers egg in water, then watch as the shell cracks and an animal model "hatches" and grows to 4 times its original size! After placing the egg in water, it will start to crack within 24 hrs. The National Geographic Wild Hatchers egg contains a sea turtle, penguin or cobra model. Comes in assorted styles only; sorry, specific style requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Put this National Geographic Wild Hatchers egg in water, then watch as the shell cracks and an animal model "hatches" and grows to 4 times its original size!
